title: Comparative Analysis of Meaning-Making in Statistics Education: Discussion-Based Inquiry

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistical concepts, educational field experience, understanding of social science research methodologies
context.additional_context: A course focusing on pre-service teachers analyzing differences between expert statistical interpretations and educational contexts, primarily involving smartphone-based discussion activities and project collaborations

learning_goals: Learners can conduct critical discussions on hypothetical statistical cases within an educational context.
Learners can compare differences in meaning construction between expert statistical interpretations and their educational applications.
Learners can design implementation plans for educational settings based on contextual interpretations of statistical data.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
